main.name: Jacob Powell
main.description: I create software that no one knows is there until it isn't
main.bio: I'm a very people oriented person. I enjoy talking and working with others in a productive and thoughtful way in order to get things done in a fun and effective manner. I have many hobbies and interests, including playing card games, Soccer, Running, Gardening, and Programming of course!
main.contactmessage: If you wish to get into contact with me, please fill out your information here and I will get back to you as soon as I can!

resume.skillmessage: I work with a wide variety of technologies! Here's some of my favorites in no particular order.

education.description: Describe your experience at school, what you learned, what useful skills you have acquired etc.

work.title: Software Engineer
description: Created a Mock API for use in QA for performance testing with Typescript and deployed on AWS
Built up testing suites and integration tests from the ground up

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Took web application from design to production in 10 weeks by leveraging Serverless technology through AWS and Python
Met with team in daily standups to discuss work accomplished and work to be done for the day
Demoed progress weekly to various managers from various teams such as Security and Operations

work.title: Student Research Assistant
description: Researched methods for aiding in Cancer Prognosis
Used various methods such as recursive feature elimination to help reduce the amount of dimensions within a dataset
Tested various machine learning models and measured effectiveness from each model to determine the most effective one to use

work.title: Software Engineer
description: Designed and built a software solution to transport over 500,000 points of data from RFID chips daily
Saved thousands of dollars and dozens of man hours by pivoting the development of a software project into a different direction and executing on it

projects.title: TCG Inventory
projects.category: Virtual Magic: The Gathering inventory manager and price tracker
